name: Dicey Slide
description:
Dicey Slide is a rage runner made for the GMTKJAM 2022 with the theme "Roll of the Dice", feel free to play it! 

Objective: You are a character called Dicey, your goal is to roll down the hill collecting blue and red dices as you go! Once obtained you can use the dices as powerups! Blue dices will give you a speed boost and red dice will give you the ability to jump infinitly!
Challenge your friends to see who can get the furthest!

Controls: LMB - Pressing buttons,  RMB - Jump,  Scrollwheel - Zoom in and out

PLEASE NOTE: This is my first GameJam and this game was made in under 50 hours and it's quite buggy. Some  bugs including flying through the map, when going too fast. Please report bugs so I can solve the issues! Make sure to be nice!
